FishingHook.name: FISHING HOOK
FishingHook.description: This missile deals <c=redd>1</c> damage and pulls you <c=keyword>3</c> spaces <c=keyword>{0}</c>. <c=downside>It cannot miss if you are to its</c> <c=keyword>{1}</c><c=downside>!</c>

RevChallenge.0:
<c=healing>ACCEPT</c>
Both parties agree to race to play a game of <c=keyword>Block, Shoot, Reload</c>. <c=keyword>The enemy will behave differently and there's consequences for winning or losing.</c>
RevChallenge.2: Hear the rules to the game.
